Verb *salvage*
***************

Documentation for the salvage verb in */cmds/verbs/salvage.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``salvage <something>``
 |  ``salvage <a lot of things>``
 |  ``salvage <something> on <something>``
 |  ``salvage all``

 Salvage parts from something you found turning it into materials.
